title: Council-Benefit Eligibility Triage
description: ML classifier used by a local council to pre-triage benefit applications for manual review. Outputs eligibility likelihood and key drivers; final decisions remain with trained caseworkers.
drift_detection: PSI on top features + canary alerts; shadow scoring vs. holdout
robustness_tests: Stress tests on missing fields/outliers; adversarial spelling; backtesting on economic shocks
worst_vuln_fix: Patched critical CVE in dependency SBOM; rotated service credentials
safe_mode: Fallback to full manual review with queue escalation
key_features: Income, dependents, prior claims, residency duration, council tax band
credible_harms: Wrong denial of benefits → financial hardship
Approving ineligible claim → public funds misuse
bias_tests: Equal opportunity & demographic parity monitored monthly; intersectional slices
fairness_stakeholders: Citizens Advice group; DPO; service managers
diversity_steps: Oversampled under-represented age groups; stratified validation
